title: riot help me pls my LCU its problem not work in screen PC 1360x768
body: my pc not have screen card.LCU its error not working in 1360x768 my srceen.im not play mode nexus siege

replies.body: What kind of error are you seeing specifically? Are you able to play other modes, and you just can't play nexus siege?
my PC problem last everning my bro play nexus siege so normal.2h35 PM im turn on PC and play game nexus siege not working my screen jump so high max screen 2560 x 1600@@

When you say your screen is jumping high, do you mean your FPS is higher than usual? 

If your FPS is really high, there could be some sort of issue with your in-game settings or possibly software drivers. Try looking over this [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) for some potential fixes.
no my screen jump so high not play game.im open screen resolution.i see tab display generic non-pnp monitor and resolution jump in max 2560x1600@@
